channel.title: Error!
channel.description:
Problem: Here is my problem when I run my server: [code]Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList<ItemHandler.java:311> at ItemHandler.<init><ItemHandler.java:39> at server.main<server.java:27> ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1093 Client type: low memory version UserId: 49236689 owner froggy has signed onto server.[/code]
Server Base: TestScape
Rating: ?/10
I need to fix this so my server will run correctly. I also got another error with Compile after I did someones tut. adn here that one is: Problem: This is my problem with compile: [code]client.java: 'else' without 'if' else if <command.equalsIgnorCase<"modsonly"> && playerRights >= 1> ^ client.java:14453: '>' expected else if <NPCID == 1699 { //ghost shop keeper ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Server Base: TestScape
Diffucultly ?/10

item.title: Error!

item.description:

client.java: 'else' without 'if' else if <command.equalsIgnorCase<"modsonly"> && playerRights >= 1> ^ client.java:14453: '>' expected else if <NPCID == 1699 { //ghost shop keeper ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .
